tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supplier_scorecard (
 supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
 delivery_performance DECIMAL(5,2),
 quality_performance DECIMAL(5,2),
 communication_performance DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_tracking ( 
    kpi_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    kpi_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    target_value DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL, 
    actual_value DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL, 
    kpi_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_scorecard (
  supplier_id INT,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  delivery_performance FLOAT,
  quality_performance FLOAT,
  on_time_delivery BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_metrics (
  kpi_id INT,
  kpi_name VARCHAR(50),
  kpi_description TEXT,
  kpi_target FLOAT,
  kpi_actual FLOAT,
  kpi_variance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_evaluation (
  evaluation_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  overall_score FLOAT,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_scores (
    supplier_id INT,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    delivery_performance DECIMAL,
    quality_performance DECIMAL,
    communication_performance DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_information (
    supplier_id UUID NOT NULL,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    supplier_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    supplier_contact VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_values (
    kpi_id UUID NOT NULL,
    supplier_id UUID NOT NULL,
    kpi_date DATE NOT NULL,
    kpi_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (kpi_id) REFERENCES kpi_definition(kpi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES supplier_information(supplier_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (kpi_id, supplier_id, kpi_date)
);

CREATE TABLE kpi_mapping (
    kpi_id UUID NOT NULL,
    category_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (kpi_id) REFERENCES kpi_definition(kpi_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES kpi_categories(category_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (kpi_id, category_id)
);
